Yes, photographing
yourself with people around
can be extremely intimidating at first,

so my hack and my tip is to
do it as early as possible.
Get up just before sunrise
and take the photos of yourself then
because a, there's no one really around,

and b, the lighting is
perfect during those hours.
The other good time for light is sunset,
but there are way to many people around.
So when you're just starting,

I really recommend sunrise,
even though it sucks

getting up so early,
at least you'll be able
to get those photos with no one around

so you can stuff-up as
much as you possibly want,

and no one's gonna see it
except for you, and your camera.
